course.subject: MATH
course.name: Mathematics in Daily Life
course.description: This course aims to help students develop the mathematical literacy to see the connections and applications of mathematics to daily life activities. The course consists of two components: (i) introducing different topics of mathematics in daily life such as mathematics in voting, finance, scheduling, etc, and (ii) guiding projects on the students' chosen topics of mathematics related to real life problems or other branches of study. Year 3 and 4 students are required to seek approval from instructor prior to enrollment.
